summary.span: 表示允许用户从其子元素中选择项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that allows a user to select items from among its child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的对象的集合 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从可视化树中删除项容器时，清除附加属性。 clears the attached property when the item container is removed from the visual tree. 这样做的目的是，在使用容器回收时，项容器的行为正常 。This is done so item containers behave correctly when the uses container recycling. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [优化性能：控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls)中的和 "容器回收"。For more information, see and "Container Recycling" in [Optimizing Performance: Controls](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选择了某个项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当未显式创建项容器时，使用附加属性选择中的项。Use the attached property to select an item in the when you do not explicitly create the item container. 项容器是表示中的项的类 。An item container is a class that represents an item in the . 、 和 是从继承的控件的项容器 ，并且每个项都定义了一个 **IsSelected** 属性。, , and are item containers for the controls that inherit from , and each defines an **IsSelected** property. 如果未显式创建项容器，则 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 隐式创建一个，并将项容器上的 **IsSelected** 属性设置为的值 。If you do not explicitly create an item container, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) implicitly creates one and sets the **IsSelected** property on the item container to the value of . 这是唯一读取的时间 。This is the only time is read. 如果对项所做的选择发生更改，则不会更新。 is not updated if the selection on the item changes. 如果显式创建项容器，则应使用该类的 **IsSelected** 属性。If you explicitly create an item container, you should use the **IsSelected** property on that class. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|，注册为附加, registered as Attached| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 包含两个 控件的。The follow example creates a that contains two controls. 该示例不会 为任何一个显式创建 ，因此它 直接在每个上设置 。The example does not explicitly create a for either , so it sets directly on each . 为了说明 未更新，此示例将 第一个复选框的属性绑定到 。To illustrate that is not updated, the example binds the property of the first checkbox to . 当用户取消选择中的项时 ，将 保持选中状态。When the user unselects the item in the , the remains checked. 同样，选中或取消选中 不会影响是否 在中选择了 。Likewise, checking or unchecking the does not affect whether the is selected in the . 示例将 秒绑定 到 。The example binds of the second to . 在这种情况下，取消选中中的项 会使复选框处于未选中状态，并且取消选中此复选框也将取消选择项。In this case, unselecting the item in the causes the checkbox to be unchecked, and unchecking the checkbox also unselects the item. ```xaml CheckBox.IsChecked is bound to Selector.IsChecked, which is set only once. CheckBox.IsChecked is bound to ListBoxItem.IsChecked, which is updated throughout the duration of the application. ```

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 是否应当使 与 属性中的当前项保持同步的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a should keep the synchronized with the current item in the property.

value.span: 如果 始终与 中的当前项保持同步，则为 ；如果 从不与当前项保持同步，则为 ；如果 只有在 使用 时才与当前项保持同步，则为 。

span.span: if the is always synchronized with the current item in the ; if the is never synchronized with the current item; if the is synchronized with the current item only if the uses a .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将 属性设置为， `true` 以确保选定的项始终对应于 中的属性 。You can set the property to `true` to ensure that the item selected always corresponds to the property in the . 例如，假设有两个 控件的 属性设置为同一源。For example, suppose that there are two controls with their property set to the same source. `true` 对于这两个列表框，均设置为，以确保每个列表框中的选定项 都相同。Set to `true` on both list boxes to ensure that the selected item in each is the same. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`= " "/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`= " {} "/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将两个 控件绑定到相同的 。The following example binds two controls to the same . 由于 设置为 `true` ，因此每个 控件的选定项始终相同Because is set to `true` on each , the selected item is always the same for both controls [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#4)]

[!code-xml[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#selectorevents)] [!code-csharp[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelected](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#selectorselected)] [!code-vb[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelected](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#selectorselected)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选择中第一项的索引，如果选择为空，则返回负一(-1)。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the first item in the current selection or returns negative one (-1) if the selection is empty.

value.span: 当前选择中第一个项的索引。

span.span: The index of first item in the current selection.
The default value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 支持选择单个项，则属性将 返回选定项的索引。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the index of the selected item. 如果 支持多个选择，则 返回用户首先选择的项的索引。If a supports multiple selections, returns the index of the item that the user selected first. 如果设置 支持多个选择，则会清除现有选定项，并将所选内容设置为索引指定的项。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified by the index. 如果选择为空，则返回-1。 returns -1 if selection is empty. 如果将设置 为小于-1 的值， 则会引发。If you set to a value less that -1, an is thrown. 如果将设置 为等于或大于子元素数的值，则将忽略该值。If you set to a value equal or greater than the number of child elements, the value is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 属性设置为1，这将选择中的第二项 。The following example creates a and sets the property to 1, which selects the second item in the . [!code-xaml[ListBoxItems_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] 下面的示例使用 属性来确定索引0处的项是否为选定内容中的第一项。The following example uses the property to determine whether the item at index 0 is the first item in the selection. [!code-csharp[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#selectorselectedindex)] [!code-vb[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#selectorselectedindex)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 支持选择单个项，则属性将 返回选定的项。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the selected item. 如果 支持多个选择，则 返回用户首先选择的项。If a supports multiple selections, returns the item that the user selected first. 如果设置 支持多个选择，则会清除现有的选定项，并将所选内容设置为指定的项。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例从获取 。The following example gets the from a . summary.span: 获取或设置通过使用 而获取的 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the , obtained by using .
The value of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定属性的路径，该属性用于确定属性的值 。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 如果将设置 为 x 值，则会尝试选择其值的计算结果为 X 的项; 如果找不到此类项，则会清除所选内容。Setting to a value X attempts to select an item whose value evaluates to X; if no such item can be found, the selection is cleared. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定 到对象的集合 `Employee` 。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 该示例将 设置 `@EmployeeNumber` 为 和 `12345` 。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 这将选择 `Employee` 作为的 `12345` 值 `EmployeeNumber` 。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此示例还将绑定 到的 。This example also binds a to the of the . 当用户更改中的选定内容时 ，将 更新以显示当前所选员工的员工编号。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定属性的路径，该属性用于确定属性的值 。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定 到对象的集合 `Employee` 。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 该示例将 设置 `@EmployeeNumber` 为 和 `12345` 。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 这将选择 `Employee` 作为的 `12345` 值 `EmployeeNumber` 。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此示例还将绑定 到的 。This example also binds a to the of the . 当用户更改中的选定内容时 ，将 更新以显示当前所选员工的员工编号。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. summary.span: 当 的选择更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the selection of a changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当所选内容发生更改时，将发生此事件。This event occurs whenever there is a change to a selection. 仅用户交互，还可以通过绑定和其他设置值更改选择。A selection can be changed not only by user interaction but also by binding as well as other set values. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将事件附加 到列表框控件。The following example shows how to attach the event to a list box control. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何处理 事件。The following example shows how to handle the event. [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]
